teMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"storeIndex","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"productIndex","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"newPrice","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updatePrice","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"storeIndex","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdrawFunds","outputs":[],"payable":true,"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Alquamah Shahid","methods":{"addAdmin(address)":{"details":"Admin rights can be granted only by admin. Only users that has  requested store owner rights can be promoted. ","params":{"newAdmin":"User address that will be granted with admin right."}},"addProductToStoreFront(uint256,string,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Caller needs to be store owner or admin.","params":{"name":"Name of product.","price":"Price of product.      ","quantity":"Quantity of product.      ","storeIndex":"Storefront index that will be removed."}},"addStoreOwner(address)":{"details":"Store owner rights can be granted only by admin. Only users that has  requested store owner rights can be promoted. ","params":{"newStoreOwner":"User address that will be granted with store owner right."}},"addStorefront(string)":{"details":"Caller needs to be store owner or admin.","params":{"name":"Name for new storefront."}},"constructor":{"details":"Contract creator is always admin."},"deleteUser(address)":{"details":"Last item of the users map will be moved to index that will be removed.  Index is also updated accordingly for the moved item. After that last user  address is removed from the userIndexes."},"emergencyWithdraw()":{"details":"Contract should be deactivated before function call. This function can be called only contract owner."},"getAllProductsFromStorefront(address,uint256)":{"details":"Returns three arrays: names (in bytes), prices and quantities.  Array indexes is corresponding with each other.","params":{"storeIndex":"Storefront index that contains products to be returned.","storeOwner":"Store owner address."},"return":"names Array of product names in bytes.prices Array of product prices.quantities Array of product quantities.ipfsHash Array of product IPFS hash in bytes."},"getStorefronts(address)":{"details":"Returns three arrays: names (in bytes), balances and  product count. Array indexes is corresponding with each other.","params":{"storeOwner":"Store owner address that owns storefronts."},"return":"names Array of storefront names in bytes.balances Array of storefront balances.productCount Array of storefront product counts"},"getUserBalance(address)":{"params":{"userAddress":"User's address that owns storefront."},"return":"combinedBalance Combined balance of storefronts for the given user."},"getUserStatus(address)":{"params":{"userAddress":"User's address."},"return":"userStatus Status of the registered user."},"getUsers()":{"details":"Returns two arrays. Users array index is corresponding to status array index.","return":"addrs Array of users' addressesstatuses Array of users' statuses"},"purchaseProduct(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"If sended value is bigger than ","params":{"productIndex":"Product index to be purchased.","quantity":"Purchase quantity.","storeIndex":"Storefront index that contains product to be purchased.","storeOwner":"Store owner address."}},"removeProductFromStorefront(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Caller needs to be store owner or admin. Store owner can remove  only own products and admin can remove any product.","params":{"productIndex":"Product index that will be removed.","storeIndex":"Storefront index that contains product to be removed.","storeOwner":"Store owner address."}},"removeStorefront(address,uint256)":{"details":"Caller needs to be store owner or admin. Store owner can remove only  own stores and admin can remove any store.","params":{"storeIndex":"Storefront index that will be removed.","storeOwner":"Store owner's address that has storefront to be removed."}},"requestStoreOwnerStatus()":{"details":"Request is needed before shop owner rights can be granted."},"updateIpfsHashForProductPic(uint256,uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"Picture hash is initialized as empty when product is created. Hash is in hex format without \"Qm\" prefix so it fits to bytes32.  Picture hash needs to be added afterwards.","params":{"picIpfsHash":"Product picture hash in IPFS","productIndex":"Product index that will be updated.","storeIndex":"Storefront index that contains product to be updated."}},"updatePrice(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only store owner can update own products' prices.","params":{"newPrice":"New price for the product.","productIndex":"Product index that will be updated.","storeIndex":"Storefront index that contains product to be updated."}},"withdrawFunds(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"User can only withdraw funds from own storefront.","params":{"amount":"Amount of funds that will be withdrawed from the storefront.","storeIndex":"Storefront index where funds will be withdrawed."}}},"title":"Web3Bazaar. "},"userdoc":{"methods":{"addAdmin(address)":{"notice":"Grant store admin rights for user. "},"addProductToStoreFront(uint256,string,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Add product to specified storefront. "},"addStoreOwner(address)":{"notice":"Grant store owner rights for user. "},"addStorefront(string)":{"notice":"Add new storefront. "},"constructor":"Constructor function creates contract and specfies ","deleteUser(address)":{"notice":"Delete registered user. "},"emergencyWithdraw()":{"notice":"Withdraw all funds in case of emergency. "},"getAllProductsFromStorefront(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Get all products from specified storefront."},"getStorefronts(address)":{"notice":"Get all storefronts. "},"getUserBalance(address)":{"notice":"Get combined balance of storefronts for user."},"getUserStatus(address)":{"notice":"Get User status for the given address."},"getUsers()":{"notice":"Get all registered users and their statuses. "},"purchaseProduct(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Purchase product."},"removeProductFromStorefront(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Remove product from specified storefront."},"removeStorefront(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Remove existing storefront owned by store owner. "},"requestStoreOwnerStatus()":{"notice":"Request store owner rights for caller."},"updateIpfsHashForProductPic(uint256,uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"Update IPFS hash code for the product picture."},"updatePrice(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Update product price. "},"withdrawFunds(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraw funds that have been earned. "}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/mnt/c/users/shahida/downloads/ethbazaar/contracts/Web3Bazaar.sol":"Web3Bazaar"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/mnt/c/users/shahida/downloads/ethbazaar/contracts/LibraryDemo.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa41ac4b9387d0d3182fff93edc086f636e5532097e4b269e91573f96fcda577e","urls":["bzz-raw://d7b7da8b7fb6c266f552b22b2b4ee159d2b2a0850793b13ed60023964b2517d1","dweb:/ipfs/QmWs57dwFNb77E8pjJ3eyusAJwPEWhVma5g1kgWZvqyTjH"]},"/mnt/c/users/shahida/downloads/ethbazaar/contracts/Web3Bazaar.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9d43c8bc5abc29ee5f7631c67544e11bdc4ab3620e9d9ce8e130e8fbc422c3e9","urls":["bzz-raw://7ca744c65d947065def6b4fe6ce040ea88bad804ef56d9e81bfa9ee051df444d","dweb:/ipfs/QmdG3X1oCJcz8YgpmbtH2ovp3Q6DT1keLYn7W9DYwq5R9A"]},"/mnt/c/users/shahida/downloads/ethbazaar/contracts/Web3Security.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa2b68fae6150dca74c99bf8135c0b7889c324090d2d6b7b68135491606c48ecf","urls":["bzz-raw://6b1b70c6eb8f64cb3e8b34000ce263a501ee8c93beb7c312746fd1f8a3508e8f","dweb:/ipfs/QmcrjJfkqg9gqZSwbFkUFrEZuCP9xTXBdV9yg5ZgjfkWCh"]}},"version":1}

addAdmin(address).details: Admin rights can be granted only by admin. Only users that has  requested store owner rights can be promoted.

params.newAdmin: User address that will be granted with admin right.

addProductToStoreFront(uint256,string,ui.details: Caller needs to be store owner or admin.

params.name: Name of product.
params.storeIndex: Storefront index that will be removed.

addStoreOwner(address).details: Store owner rights can be granted only by admin. Only users that has  requested store owner rights can be promoted.

params.newStoreOwner: User address that will be granted with store owner right.

addStorefront(string).details: Caller needs to be store owner or admin.

deleteUser(address).details: Last item of the users map will be moved to index that will be removed.  Index is also updated accordingly for the moved item. After that last user  address is removed from the userIndexes.

emergencyWithdraw().details: Contract should be deactivated before function call. This function can be called only contract owner.

getAllProductsFromStorefront(address,uin.details: Returns three arrays: names (in bytes), prices and quantities.  Array indexes is corresponding with each other.

params.storeIndex: Storefront index that contains products to be returned.

getStorefronts(address).details: Returns three arrays: names (in bytes), balances and  product count. Array indexes is corresponding with each other.

params.storeOwner: Store owner address that owns storefronts.

getStorefronts(address).return: names Array of storefront names in bytes.balances Array of storefront balances.productCount Array of storefront product counts

getUserBalance(address).return: combinedBalance Combined balance of storefronts for the given user.

getUserStatus(address).return: userStatus Status of the registered user.

requestStoreOwnerStatus().details: Request is needed before shop owner rights can be granted.
